tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Anuradha Mam is a true angel who walked me through the most difficult phase of life- I remember the day I was devastated with no cardiac activity result on my scan, and the anxiousness I had when i started bleeding in the night- I called mam, and she explained me what to do just like how my mom had explained periods to me when I first got it!! 
All the 3-4 weeks when I was going through the medical abortion, Mam was making herself available for me  in spite of her busy schedules.  I remember I calling her in pain amidst her surgery which she informed, and I continued to tell her how painful and anxious I was , instead of hanging up on me, she took a minute to explain that things with me were normal and she would call back after her surgery. and She did call me back in the night to check how I was doing!! 
She was not alone focusing on treating my physical pain with tablets but also studied my emotions  when considering the option on treatment plan. She helped me take things slow, take things right and kept herself with me even when she was too tired. SHE IS A DOCTOR, A TRUE ONE, that wants to treat people more than anything .
reply_text: Thank you so much and wishing you good health always

review:
Dr. P. V. Anuradha is a very very nice doctor. I have visited her twice till today. I am facing few gynecology problems which i can not disclose. However the way doctor treats patients is really superb. I am very happy for the same.

As the problems of gynecology will be very private, patient would speak to doctor only after they get the confidence in doctor. In this case doctor speaks very polite and listens to patients. She keeps up good time to speak to her patients and understand the problems. She is a patient friendly doctor as well.

When it comes to my problem doctor has diagnosed and given me few medicines. After completion of the medicines course, i got cured by my problem. The cure was very quick and effective. I am very happy for the way she treated me.

The clinic is very well maintained with the best facilities. The consultation fee of rupees two hundred fifty is also not much compared to other doctor. I would happily recommend this doctor to other patients.

Thanks a lot to doctor Anuradha for the best treatment.

I am registered with Dr Anuradha and regularly visiting to her. She is very kind and give very good treatment. She provides effective treatment.If the patient is on high risk she gives extra care and focus to that patient.I had some complications so i visited to Dr Anuradha  I dont want to take any risk  she has taken all my medical history details  I am really so glad to get consulted with Dr Anuradaha as she is very helpful and cooperative with me.Some time s her practice is busy but i am okay with that if i am getting full car and attention. She is very devotee for her profession and that thing i liked the most about her.



on Every appointment I had, I would come with my list of questions written down and Dr. Anuradha took the time to answer each question thoughtfully and carefully - she is very smart, well read, and informative. She showed me a ton of empathy and sensitivity for some of the tough issues I was facing and made me feel reassured that I was in good hands with a dr who was going to carefully monitor my health condition.

Clinic  is also good and nicely managed  staff behave nicely with the patients. Overall i am fully satisfied with the dr.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I am fully satisfied with Dr.Anuradha, she is very friendly, satisfied with her treatment, the way she explained about the health problem., I am only unhappy with wait time.My appointment time was 7pm, I have waited for nearly 2hrs to meet doctor. .it was crowded.  I got fed up in waiting.i have also noticed. patients who are coming after me are allowed to meet doctor before me. I checked with staffs in what order they are sending patient.., but did not get proper response. finally I felt very bad in waiting and walked out. they stopped me and allowed me to meet doctor immediately. so I think. they have to improve the wait time of patients. we are not able to meet doctor on the appointed timing. this leads to complete dissatisfaction.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ******** ** *** **** ******** * **** ****** ** ********** I had pregnancy hypertension and even bled in the initial weeks and that created a lot pressure on me but the doctor gave me the best advice on the food I intake, the exercises I should be doing etc.. I had the atmosphere care from here and anytime Of the day (or night) she is ready to clarify any kind of clarifications I would ask through whastapp. Even my delivery and post delivery care went on smoothly with her help. I would hands down suggest her to anyone I know...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I visited her clinic yesterday for the first time and i was very happy for having chosen that place. After suffering from a stubborn furuncle for 1 week which showed no response to the treatment given by a couple of doctors previously, i visited Dr.P.V.Anuradha yesterday. To sum up my experience in Dr.P.V.Anuradha's clinic..
1) The doctor made me feel very comfortable with her casual and friendly approach. She gave ears to the history very patiently and assured me with confidence since i was a bit scared because i thought if any surgical procedure would be needed. She only prescribed tablets and it has been only 1 day now and the furuncle is already showing recession. *** ** *** ** *** **** ******* ** *** *****
Other reasons why i would recommed her clinic are..
2) The ambience of the clinic is very pleasant and welcoming 😊
3) Well trained nurses with a very kind, polite attitude.
OVERALL EXPERIENCE : 5 on 5

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
The clinic is swanky and very well maintained. The staff were professional in interaction with CX and patients.good coverage of services like lab and scanning .I was attended to promptly          
      DR Anuradha was just excellent .she attended to my wife in an in hurried way allocating plenty of time to discuss my wife problem .she was very informative and gave me what ever patient need most clarity coverage and specific directions to proceed future I had a wonderful experience with her and I will definitely recommended her two people I know thank you Anna Anuradha mam
reply_text:
Thanks for your nice words
Will always take best care

review:
I booked appointment by practo and it was easy finding doctors near by us. 
I had little disappointment while meeting the doctor. She reached there only 10.20am. my appointment was at 9.30 am. that's ok always we face this time delay. the real problem was after the doctor arrival. we waited n waited till 11.00am. then at-last called in to meet her.

We went in and she was very fast and worrying and asked the nurse how many more patients there. she started asking few questions. then she insisted to do all checkup. Her Treatment is Good but, The Ladies who has fear or may be her first baby they may expect some sort cool advice about the happening how it will be? what you will face like tat.. she did nothing of that and started from the clinic before our test completes.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had been looking for a good gynecologist for the past 6 months and after meeting a few doctors I finally found Dr.Anuradha. I am so happy to find a doctor who listened to me and understood my problems. She is knowledgeable and kind. Although she is an hour away from me, I have no intention of changing the gynecologist. 
Office staff is also very friendly, especially Liya. 
Aanya clinic is extremely clean and beautifully done.  I was surprised to see how well it’s kept and managed.
reply_text:
Thank you so much Geetanjali
Such a pleasure to have a lovely person like you as a client

review:
It was very refreshing to finally meet a doctor who actually listens to u and has an open mind. She is not like the other whole bunch of.......  who think that the patient sitting across the table is a fool and they can make a.... out of her/him. 
I am really glad I met her. Keeping my fingers cross, she would be the gynaecologist for me and my daughter a d anyone asking me for reference. Pleasing personality, not overbearing, not intimidating. Lovely!! God bless!!

It was very refreshing to finally meet a doctor who actually listens to u and has an open mind. She is not like the other whole bunch of.......  who think that the patient sitting across the table is a fool and they can make a.... out of her/him. 
I am really glad I met her. Keeping my fingers cross, she would be the gynaecologist for me and my daughter a d anyone asking me for reference. Pleasing personality, not overbearing, not intimidating. Lovely!! God bless!!

Doctor was awesome in explain the core reason for why these changes and irregularities in period cycle... Didn't started prescribing and handing out medication before the tests result came like most of them do nowadays... Also didn't put into unnecessary medication regimes, gave only medications necessary and adviced on how to maintain proper life style/ healthy living style... Basically a cheerful understanding and easy to communicate person...

After a long time I experienced a humanely touch in a doctor visit.  Dr. Anuradha listened to us out patiently and was empathetic.  Also she was so optimistic that gave us a sense of reassurance that we are in right hands. Unlike many doctors these days she gave us lot of time for hearing our problems and gave us suggestions followed by medication. Me and my wife are extremely satisfied with our visit to Dr.  Anuradha.

I consulted Dr. Anuradha formmy first pregnancy. She is one of the friendliest *** ************* doctors I have had the pleasure of knowing. She made the entire journey from being pregnant to delivery very simple and comfortable for me. She was able to understand our background and provide the right consultation. Her staff are well trained and I would highly recommend her for every mother looking at having a baby. She is truly gifted.

- More waiting chairs recommend
Very friendly doctor, she listens to the patients queries patiently and explains the treatment plan clearly

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Hello Doctor,I am a diabetic woman planning for pregnancy. As per your suggestion I have been trying to reduce by HBA1C level to 5.5. But it's always varying between 5.9 to 6.3. I am walking regularly for 1 hour daily and following a low card diet. Please advise if it's healthy to get conceived at this point. Also please advise on any extra precaution I should take to lower by HBA1C level to 5.5. I am having glycomet gp2 500 mg for diabetes every morning before food.Awaiting your valuable suggestions. Thanks.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I came to Dr. Anuradha mam with a big problem. I had endometriotic cyst and one dermoid cyst in right overy. Before coming to Mam, I have consulted with other doctors, but did not get  ve result.Anuradha mam gave me full support as I was scared of operation. She had operated me for cyst removal and gave me confident that I can conceive, and after 8 month of my opr, I have conceived😊she is very humble simple and down to earth in nature. She is ready to solve any query any time despite her busy schedule. Really a very good doctor I have ever seen.Thankyou Mam for everything
reply_text: Thanks very much

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: It was indeed a great experience with Dr. Anuradha madam. I consulted her for my pregnancy related issues. And it was the best thing I did in that phase of my life. By just seeing her smiling face, we forget all our worries. With her I always felt that I'm in safe hands. She was just there (via call/sms) whenever I needed her. All our queries were answered in every visit. She’s very friendly and genuine. I wish her all the luck and happiness. Now I'm blessed with a little beautiful princess. Thanking her from the bottom of my heart.

She is my goddess and life saver..very positive talk..I have faced many health issues past 18 years..she was treated well and gave me positive energy to live boldly..she never prescribed only medicines to cure problems. She advise to change food habits and she vl say to do exercises yoga meditation and al..she never said to take unnecessary test like others...she won't create fear of diseases to patients ..always talk positively ...friendly doctor... Am happy with her treatment and always thank to her....thank u mam...

Doc is so friendly,lovable and caring person for her patients. she will never leave her patient to feel low she encourages them in all ways . doc was the one who delivered my baby boy .there are no words to discribe how greatful we r for everything she has done to us she was so kind and honest to her profession and throughout the delivery time.she always think out of the box that makes her to reach this high on her carrier and the passion she has for her job we can’t thank you for giving us a good resemblance of family.

.After my marriage i came first time in chennai i face some gyne problems i dont know anything here after few days i found her information through google then after i visit her... in my first visit she make me cry as because now a days also good nd friendly caring doctor are there....she make me feel so happy that i cant express...after i met mam anuradha she listen everything about my problem i can tell her freely about everything without any fear....after my treatment i am alright now nd i am so happy with her treatment....i love you so much mam...i am still under her treatment

She hears the problem so patiently and suggest the apt medication which can suit my body. I will highly recommend to visit Dr. Anuradha. Thanks a lot Mam for checking me thoroughly. I will give 5/5 for her treatment and service she provided. Everyone in her clinic was so polite and humble. Thanks a lot.

review: I had a video consultation with Dr. Anuradha for my PCOS treatment. She is punctual, a good listener and an effective evaluator and has provided me with very helpful information. Also, she is easy to talk to, clarifies all your queries and is very friendly. All in all, I had a great meeting with her and am quite comfortable to devise a holistic plan together to manage my condition :) I highly recommend her!
reply_text: Thanks for your positive words... looking forward to giving you a good holistic health care approach to solve the PCOS issue
